name: Chili-Orange Avocado Soup
keywords: appetizer, avocado, chilies, low-fat milk, gluten-free, low-fat, nut-free, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 3 hot chilies, or to taste, seeded and coarsely chopped
4 cloves garlic, peeled and coarsely chopped
2 teaspoons salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the avocados, lime juice, chilies and garlic in a food processor and process until smooth. Add the yogurt, milk, salt, pepper, orange zest and juice. Process until smooth. Refrigerate until chilled. Taste and add more salt if needed. Divide among 4 soup cups, garnish with the cilantro and serve immediately.
